fr.umlv.escape.world

Class EscapeWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.world.EscapeWorld

  • public class EscapeWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent the world simulation of the Escape game. It is the link with the Jbox2d lib. All uses of the jbox2d should be done using this class. This class is thread safe so that many thread can interact with the world at the same time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float SCALE
      Constant that represent the scale between the world simulation and the world draw in the screen.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(Body body,
             boolean state)
        Set a body to active or inactive. An inactive body does not act in the simulation of the world.
        Parameters:
        body - to set the state.
        state - The new state of the body.
